item.title: How to make 1 starter per person
item.dc:creator: @ynnah ynnah
item.description:
@ynnah wrote:

Title says it All i need is the code and were to put it

This is what I have so far in Command.java

if (cmd.equals("starter")) { c.addItem(995, 5000000); c.addItem(1725, 1); c.addItem(1277, 1); c.addItem(1171, 1); c.addItem(1061, 1); c.addItem(1117, 1); c.addItem(1075, 1); c.addItem(1129, 1); c.addItem(841, 1); c.addItem(882, 200); c.addItem(577, 1); c.addItem(1011, 1); c.addItem(1379, 1); c.addItem(556, 150); c.addItem(555, 150); c.addItem(557, 150); c.addItem(554, 150); c.addItem(558, 300); c.addItem(562, 100); }
